trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows label control that can display hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 標籤控制項，可顯示超連結。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> and LinkLabel controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>控制項取代，並將功能加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>和 LinkLabel 控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> and LinkLabel controls are retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>且如果您選擇保留 LinkLabel 控制項的回溯相容性及未來使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: The LinkLabel control is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control with the exception that it can display a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: LinkLabel 控制項是類似於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>與例外狀況，它可以顯示超連結控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: Multiple hyperlinks can be specified in the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定多個超連結控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: Each hyperlink can perform a different task within an application.
trans-unit.target: 每個超連結可以執行應用程式中不同的工作。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a hyperlink to display a Web site in Microsoft Internet Explorer or to load a log file associated with an application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用超連結，在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中顯示的網站，或以載入應用程式相關聯的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Each hyperlink displayed in the LinkLabel control is an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class.
trans-unit.target: LinkLabel 控制項中顯示的超連結是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>的執行個體

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class defines display information, state, and location of the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別會定義顯示的資訊、 狀態和超連結的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class enables you to associate information, such as a URL to display, with the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別可讓您建立關聯的資訊，例如若要顯示，與超連結 URL。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks a hyperlink within the control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event is raised, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object representing the hyperlink that was clicked is passed as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs> object that is passed as a parameter to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下控制項中的超連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>就會引發事件，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>物件代表已按下超連結的一部分傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs>做為參數傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object associated with the hyperlink that was clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此物件來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>使用者已按下超連結相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>

trans-unit.source: All hyperlinks contained within the LinkLabel control are stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class instance for the control.
trans-unit.target: LinkLabel 控制項中包含的所有超連結會儲存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>控制項的類別執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to add a hyperlink to the LinkLabel control.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式可將 LinkLabel 控制項中的超連結。

trans-unit.source: The quickest way is to specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> and assign it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 最快的方式是指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>並將它指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to specify a single hyperlink within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您指定超連結控制項的文字中。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple hyperlinks, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class by accessing the collection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入多個超連結，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別藉由存取透過集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a LinkLabel control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the LinkLabel control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: LinkLabel 控制項建立時，包含 LinkLabel 控制項內的所有文字的預設超連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property, or specify a link using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定新的連結區域，以覆寫此預設連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性，或指定的連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以移除預設的超連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A> property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A>屬性是`true`根據預設，只要至少一個連結的長度大於零的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: The LinkLabel control has a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: LinkLabel 控制項有單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order.
trans-unit.target: 不過，每個連結的長度大於零會取得自己定位停駐點，以左到右的順序。

trans-unit.source: To prevent tab navigation to the LinkLabel control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免索引標籤瀏覽至 LinkLabel 控制項，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, be aware that adding new links to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> collection will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A> property to `true` again.
trans-unit.target: 不過，請注意，將新連結加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>集合將會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A>屬性`true`一次。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>

trans-unit.source: The LinkLabel provides a number of properties that enable you to define the display appearance of hyperlinks in the control.
trans-unit.target: LinkLabel 提供許多可讓您定義的顯示外觀的超連結控制項中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties define the colors used when displaying a hyperlink in various states.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性會定義用來顯示各種狀態的超連結的色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> property defines the display of the underline that is associated with a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>屬性會定義超連結相關聯的底線顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的預設執行個體的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示作用中連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 作用中連結會是正在被按下的連結。

trans-unit.source: This is similar to the depressed state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 這是類似於使用的狀態的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來指定程序在按下連結時，將會顯示在的連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of colors associated with a link.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> specifies the color of all links displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>指定顯示中的所有連結的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您指定的連結色彩之後使用者已瀏覽,。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a link is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A> is used to display the link in a disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 停用連結時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>用來將連結顯示為停用狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性時，請確定所設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確連結正在被按下。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color to display an active link.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，代表要顯示作用中連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Red" name="Color.Red" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩由系統所指定，此色彩通常是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Red" name="Color.Red" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的協助工具物件，以便<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有明確呼叫 CreateAccessibilityInstance 方法，它會呼叫時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>參考屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 若要取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入隨.NET Framework 安裝之 Accessibility 組件的參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notes to Inheritors: When overriding CreateAccessibilityInstance in a derived class, you should not call the base class's CreateAccessibilityInstance method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承者注意事項︰ 當在衍生類別中覆寫 CreateAccessibilityInstance 時，您不應該呼叫基底類別的 CreateAccessibilityInstance 方法。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for this control.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個控制項的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the .NET Framework, this should not be called.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會呼叫這個方法，這不應該呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes should always call <xref uid="langword_csharp_base.createHandle" name="base.createHandle" href=""></xref> when overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別應該一律呼叫<xref uid="langword_csharp_base.createHandle" name="base.createHandle" href=""></xref>時覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a disabled link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示停用的連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the color for links that are disabled in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可讓您指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>中已停用連結的色彩

trans-unit.source: Disabled links do not cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 已停用的連結並不會造成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>

trans-unit.source: There are a number of colors associated with a link.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。

trans-unit.source: All links in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> are initially displayed with the color defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>最初顯示在定義的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您它正在被按下時，指定連結的色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您指定的連結色彩之後使用者已瀏覽,。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性時，請確定所設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確的連結已停用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color when displaying a disabled link.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>顯示已停用的連結代表的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Empty" name="Empty" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Empty" name="Empty" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的平面樣式外觀<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the range in the text to treat as a link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定範圍中要視為連結的文字。

trans-unit.source: The LinkArea property provides a quick way to specify a single hyperlink to display in the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: LinkArea 屬性提供快速的方法來指定單一的超連結，可顯示的文字中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> object provides properties that specify the starting position of the link within the text of the control and the length of text for the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>物件提供屬性，指定控制項的文字和超連結文字的長度內連結的開始位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>

trans-unit.source: When a hyperlink is specified using the LinkArea property, the hyperlink is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 LinkArea 屬性來指定超連結時，超連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>

trans-unit.source: The LinkArea property converts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> object assigned to it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object that is stored within the collection.
trans-unit.target: LinkArea 屬性轉換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>物件指派給要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>會儲存在集合內的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>

trans-unit.source: To add multiple hyperlinks to the text of the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要將多個超連結加入至控制項的文字，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property enables you to access the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>, which stores the links specified for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>屬性可讓您存取的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>，它會儲存為控制項指定的連結。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method of adding links to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> also enables you to specify data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property that is associated with the link being created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法加入連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>也可讓您指定的資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>所建立的連結與相關聯的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property can be used to store the location of a file to display or the address of a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>屬性可以用來儲存要顯示之檔案的位置或網站的位址。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>建立控制項時，預設包含的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>內的所有文字的超連結</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>時

trans-unit.source: You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the LinkArea property, or specify a link using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定新的連結區域與 LinkArea 屬性，來覆寫此預設連結，或指定使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>的連結

trans-unit.source: You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以移除預設的超連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The LinkArea property always returns the first item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>, regardless of how the hyperlink was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > LinkArea 屬性一律會傳回第一個項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>，不論超連結新增至集合的方式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> will differ if you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Text%2A> property contains double-byte characters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>會不同，如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Text%2A>屬性包含雙位元組字元。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>, it will return the number of bytes in the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>，它會傳回字串中的位元組數目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will return the number of actual characters.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會傳回實際的字元數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> that represents the area treated as a link.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref>表示視為連結的區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> object is less than zero. -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> object is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref>物件為小於零。 -或- <> </> *> 屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref>物件為小於-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示連結的行為。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the behavior of links when they are displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您在控制項中顯示時，指定連結的行為。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want links to be displayed with an underline only when the mouse pointer is over a link, you can set this property to `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想滑鼠指標位在連結時，才會顯示與底線的連結，您可以設定此屬性`LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the types of behaviors that can be associated with a link, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: 多個可以與連結相關聯的行為的類型的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_LinkBehavior.SystemDefault" name="LinkBehavior.SystemDefault" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_LinkBehavior.SystemDefault" name="LinkBehavior.SystemDefault" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value is assigned that is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值也就是不是其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a link is clicked within the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項中按下連結時。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the LinkClicked event is handled to perform tasks when the user clicks on a link in the control.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，LinkClicked 事件被用於執行工作，當使用者按一下控制項中的連結。

trans-unit.source: The event handler for the LinkClicked event is passed an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs> class that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object that is associated with the link that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: LinkClicked 事件的事件處理常式傳遞的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs>類別，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>已按下連結相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can use information specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class to determine which link was clicked or what type of task to perform when the link is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用資訊中指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別以決定何種連結已按下或哪種類型的工作執行時該連結按下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object defined with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property set to the string www.microsoft.com, you can use this information in an event handler for the LinkClicked event to display the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>物件定義其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>屬性設定為字串 www.microsoft.com，您可以使用這項資訊 LinkClicked 事件的事件處理常式中顯示的網站。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a normal link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示一般連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the color that is initially displayed for all links in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您指定最初顯示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>所有連結的色彩

trans-unit.source: There are a number of colors associated with a link.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您它正在被按下時，指定連結的色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您指定的連結色彩之後使用者已瀏覽,。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a link is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A> is used to display the link in a disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 停用連結時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>用來將連結顯示為停用狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性時，請確定所設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text of the link is not shown properly.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，連結的文字不會正確顯示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to displaying a normal link.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>代表用來顯示一般連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Blue" name="Color.Blue" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩由系統所指定，此色彩通常是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Blue" name="Color.Blue" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of links contained within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得內含的連結集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control can display any number of links within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項可以顯示任何數目的控制項文字內的連結。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> instance associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> that represents the collection of links displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>與相關聯的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>表示控制項中顯示的連結集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can then use the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class to add, remove, and find links in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以使用的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別來新增、 移除和尋找集合中的連結。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the types of tasks you can perform with the link collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊的工作類型的連結集合，您可以執行，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>建立控制項時，預設包含的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>內的所有文字的超連結</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>時

trans-unit.source: You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property, or specify a link using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定新的連結區域，以覆寫此預設連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性，或指定的連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以移除預設的超連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not need to specify more than one link to display within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要指定一個以上的連結來顯示內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a link should be displayed as though it were visited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該將連結顯示為已瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項並不會自動代表連結是瀏覽過的連結。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 若要將連結顯示為已瀏覽的連結，您可以設定這個屬性的值`true` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>的事件處理常式中

trans-unit.source: A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽過的連結會顯示使用中指定的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the form containing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is closed, the "all display" state associated with the link is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 一次表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制已關閉、 刪除與連結相關聯的 「 所有顯示 」 狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: In order to retain the display state of the link, you need to store the display state of the link in a registry setting associated with your application.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留連結的顯示狀態，您要連結的顯示狀態儲存在您的應用程式相關聯的登錄設定。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property only affects the first link defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只會影響定義中的第一個連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one link specified in the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.Visited%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有多個控制項中指定的連結時，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.Visited%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.Visited%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access all the links defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取定義中的所有連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if links should display as though they were visited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該顯示連結，就好像它們已瀏覽;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref>內滑鼠指標時要使用<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>界限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interior spacing, in pixels, between the edges of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref> and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以像素的邊緣之間的內部間距， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>及其內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> values representing the interior spacing, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>代表內部間距，像素為單位的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the link located at the specified client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得位於指定的用戶端座標處的連結。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine whether a link is located at a specific point within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷連結是否位於內的特定時間點<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> event of the control to determine whether the mouse pointer is hovering over a link in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法中的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>事件的控制項來決定是否將滑鼠指標停留在控制項中的連結。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: Once you have determined that the mouse pointer is over a link, you can then display additional information about the link to the user through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> text or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您決定將滑鼠指標是透過連結，然後可以透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>文字或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>使用者顯示連結的其他資訊

trans-unit.source: The horizontal coordinate of the point to search for a link.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋連結點的水平座標。

trans-unit.source: The vertical coordinate of the point to search for a link.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋連結點的垂直座標。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> representing the link located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>表示連結位於指定座標處。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>

trans-unit.source: If the point does not contain a link, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果端點不包含連結， <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>傳回。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message pre-processing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊字元，例如索引標籤、 RETURN、 逸出及方向鍵訊息前置處理期間，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the `isInputKey` method indicates that the control isn't interested in the key.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫這個方法`isInputKey`方法表示控制項並不感興趣的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: `processDialogKey` simply sends the character to the parent's `processDialogKey` method, or returns false if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: `processDialogKey`只傳送至父代的字元`processDialogKey`方法或如果控制項沒有父代會傳回 false。

trans-unit.source: The `Form` class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: `Form`類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: When overriding `processDialogKey`, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫`processDialogKey`，控制項應該傳回`true`以表示它具有處理金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For keys that aren't processed by the control, the result of `base.processDialogChar` should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 機碼未處理的控制，結果`base.processDialogChar`應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Key code and modifier flags.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的程式碼和修飾詞旗標。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to consume the key; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow further processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用索引鍵<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示允許進一步處理。

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: 啟動子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取的控制項定位順序中，選擇性地指定方向。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指定要選取; 控制項的方向否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在定位順序中向前移動<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>定位順序中向後移動。

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: 執行設定這個控制項範圍的工作。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this function to add size restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別可以覆寫這個函式來加入大小限制。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes must call `base.setBoundsCore` to actually cause the bounds of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別必須呼叫`base.setBoundsCore`實際上會造成變更控制項的範圍。

trans-unit.source: New left of the control.
trans-unit.target: 新增控制項左邊。

trans-unit.source: New right of the control.
trans-unit.target: 新的右邊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: New width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 新控制項的寬度。

trans-unit.source: New height of the control.
trans-unit.target: 新控制項的高度。

trans-unit.source: Which values were specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter reflects user intent, not which values have changed.
trans-unit.target: 此參數會反映使用者意圖，不是哪些值已變更。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl.DialogResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl.DialogResult%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref> control that it is the default button.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>它是預設按鈕的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control appears the same regardless of whether it is the default button, so calling this method will not change the appearance or behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項就會出現相同，無論它是預設按鈕，因此呼叫這個方法不會變更外觀或行為的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control should behave as a default button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項應作用為預設按鈕。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 會產生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the first link in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> to be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會導致中的第一個連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can tab to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以移至<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The TabStop property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: TabStop 屬性是`true`根據預設，只要至少一個連結的長度大於零的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control has a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項有單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order.
trans-unit.target: 不過，每個連結的長度大於零會取得自己定位停駐點，以左到右的順序。

trans-unit.source: To prevent tab navigation to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control, set the TabStop property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免索引標籤巡覽至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項，將 TabStop 屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: However, be aware that adding new links to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> collection will automatically set the TabStop property to `true` again.
trans-unit.target: 不過，請注意，將新連結加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>集合將會自動將 TabStop 屬性設定為`true`一次。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can tab to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>;otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以使用 tab 鍵來<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所顯示的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所顯示的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定是否要使用<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"></xref>類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 來呈現文字。

trans-unit.source: If the UseCompatibleTextRendering property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> covers the entire text.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UseCompatibleTextRendering 屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>涵蓋整個文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>

trans-unit.source: For example, text such as "abcd " is rendered with the trailing space underlined.
trans-unit.target: 例如，例如"abcd"的文字會轉譯與句尾空格加上底線。

trans-unit.source: If the UseCompatibleTextRendering property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> does not cover the entire text.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UseCompatibleTextRendering 屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>並未涵蓋完整的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性為了提供 visual Windows Form 控制項之間的相容性呈現文字使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的自訂文字轉譯</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式未從升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>類別中引進了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了提升效能，讓文字看起來比較好，並改善的國際字型支援。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別用來執行所有的文字轉譯。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]計算字元間距和自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Form 應用程式中使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別來呈現文字中，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決此不相容，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性`true`特定控制項。

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`至`true`應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>具有參數的方法`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版的相容性的文字轉譯。

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a link that that has been previously visited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示，會有先前已瀏覽的連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the `LinkLabel`<xref:System.Windows.Forms> that have been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您指定顯示中的所有連結的色彩`LinkLabel` <xref:System.Windows.Forms>，瀏覽過的使用者。</xref:System.Windows.Forms>

trans-unit.source: There are a number of colors associated with a link.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。

trans-unit.source: All links in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> are initially displayed with the color defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>最初顯示在定義的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您它正在被按下時，指定連結的色彩。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a link is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A> is used to display the link in a disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 停用連結時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>用來將連結顯示為停用狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性時，請確定所設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確的連結顯示為已瀏覽連結時。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display links that have been visited.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>代表用來顯示已瀏覽的連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Purple" name="Color.Purple" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩由系統所指定，此色彩通常是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Purple" name="Color.Purple" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes the specified Windows message.
trans-unit.target: 處理指定的 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的訊息。
